column5: Fresh surface water abstracted mio m3/y
column6: Freshwater abstracted (=Fresh surface water abstracted +Fresh groundwater abstracted )mio m3/y
column9: Net freshwater abstracted (=Freshwater abstracted-Water returned without use)mio m3/y
